Structs/Version/FormattingOptions.html#/.name: dropPatchIfZero
Structs/Version/FormattingOptions.html#/.abstract: Leave out patch part if it’s zero.

Structs/Version/FormattingOptions.html#/.name: dropMinorIfZero
Structs/Version/FormattingOptions.html#/.abstract: Leave out minor part if it’s zero. Requires dropPatchIfZero.

Structs/Version/FormattingOptions.html#/.name: includePrerelease
Structs/Version/FormattingOptions.html#/.abstract: Include the prerelease part of the version.

Structs/Version/FormattingOptions.html#/.name: includeMetadata
Structs/Version/FormattingOptions.html#/.abstract: Include the metadata part of the version.

Structs/Version.html#/s:6SemVer7VersionV.name: major
Structs/Version.html#/s:6SemVer7VersionV.abstract: The major part of this version. Must be >= 0.

Structs/Version.html#/s:6SemVer7VersionV.name: minor
Structs/Version.html#/s:6SemVer7VersionV.abstract: The minor part of this version. Must be >= 0.

Structs/Version.html#/s:6SemVer7VersionV.name: patch
Structs/Version.html#/s:6SemVer7VersionV.abstract: The patch part of this version. Must be >= 0.

Structs/Version.html#/s:6SemVer7VersionV.name: prerelease
Structs/Version.html#/s:6SemVer7VersionV.abstract: The prelease part of this version. Must only contain caracters in CharacterSet.versionSuffixAllowed.

Structs/Version.html#/s:6SemVer7VersionV.name: metadata
Structs/Version.html#/s:6SemVer7VersionV.abstract: The metadata of this version. Must only contain caracters in CharacterSet.versionSuffixAllowed.

Structs/Version.html#/s:6SemVer7VersionV.name: init(major:minor:patch:prerelease:metadata:)
Structs/Version.html#/s:6SemVer7VersionV.abstract: Creates a new version with the given parts.

Structs/Version.html#/s:6SemVer7VersionV.name: init(major:minor:patch:prerelease:metadata:)
Structs/Version.html#/s:6SemVer7VersionV.abstract: Creates a new version with the given parts.

Structs/Version.html#/s:6SemVer7VersionV.name: versionString(formattedWith:)
Structs/Version.html#/s:6SemVer7VersionV.abstract: Creates a version string using the given options.

Structs/Version/NumericPart.html.name: NumericPart
Structs/Version/NumericPart.html.abstract: Lists all the numeric parts of a version (major, minor and patch).

Structs/Version.html#/s:6SemVer7VersionV.name: next(_:keepingMetadata:)
Structs/Version.html#/s:6SemVer7VersionV.abstract: Returns the next version, increasing the given numeric part, respecting any associated rules:

Structs/Version.html#/s:6SemVer7VersionV.name: increase(_:keepingMetadata:)
Structs/Version.html#/s:6SemVer7VersionV.abstract: Increases the given numeric part of the version, respecting any associated rules:

Structs/Version/FormattingOptions.html.name: FormattingOptions
Structs/Version/FormattingOptions.html.abstract: Describes a set options that define the formatting behavior.

Structs/Version.html.name: Version
Structs/Version.html.abstract: A Version struct that implements the rules of semantic versioning.

Extensions/CharacterSet.html#/s:10Founda.name: versionSuffixAllowed
Extensions/CharacterSet.html#/s:10Founda.abstract: Contains the allowed characters for a Version suffix (Version.prelease and Version.metadata)
